long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Highway for Gmail™ gets you the truth about every motor carrier who emails you so you can see who's really hauling your freight. Click on an email within your Google Mail (Gmail™) account and Highway will tell you what you need to know about the sender.
 
Lookalike Domains
See if the sender is attempting to fraudulently represent a carrier.
 
Dispatch Service Detection
Find out if the sender is an approved third party dispatch service of a carrier.
 
Verified Identities
Click on a button to send a polite request for the sender to verify his or her identity in Highway.
 
You need an active subscription to Highway to use this extension.

Gmail™ email service is a trademark of Google LLC.
